</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Wake the Dead #1](/Sources.aspx?ID=201) pg. 27</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** bolts

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sometimes when dealing with undead incursions, a more subtle approach is called for. Paradoxically, this is precisely what the rattling bolts are most often used for, despite each one ringing like a shaken chain when launched. Once it hits the target, the rattling transfers into that creature's body. A target damaged by the rattling bolt must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or be [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) and [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) 1 for 1 round (or 1 minute on a critical hit). An undead afected by a rattling bolt further loses any lifesense ability it might have had for the same duration as the deafening.
